moves_vt1.name: Jumping MP

comments: Can be performed up to 3 times on hit only. Startup for the 2nd and 3rd hits is 5F
Value upon making contact with a standing Ryu, blocking, at the highest point
+6F on block at the lowest point
-9F on block at the highest point
Landing recovery for the 3rd attack, hit only, is 5F
